titleStmt.title: His Majesties proceedings in Northamptonshire, Glocestershire, Wilishire and Warwickshire from the 16 of August to the 23 wherein is declared his royall intention and resolution therein concerning the inhabitants of those counties : likewise the resolution of these worthy pillars of the protestant religion : namely the Lord Brookes, Colonell Hollis, Colonell Hampden, Colonell Goodwin, Colonell Fines, who are now marching towards Warwickshire with 6000 horse and foot.

His Majesties proceedings in Northamptonshire, Glocestershire, Wilishire and Warwickshire from the 16 of August to the 23 wherein is declared his royall intention and resolution therein concerning the inhabitants of those counties : likewise the resolution of these worthy pillars of the protestant religion : namely the Lord Brookes, Colonell Hollis, Colonell Hampden, Colonell Goodwin, Colonell Fines, who are now marching towards Warwickshire with 6000 horse and foot.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
